ing: 4 fluid ounces lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish
des: "This is a great drink when you are out at the lake or entertaining guests in your backyard! It combines vodka and cranberry juice with a generous splash of lemon-lime soda. Blend with ice for a slushy variation!"
ins: Pour cranberry juice and vodka into a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into your serving glass. Add lemon-lime soda and stir. Squeeze a lemon wedge into glass and stir again.
